io.nem.symbol.sdk.api

Interface NetworkRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkRepositoryOkHttpImpl, NetworkRepositoryVertxImpl

    public interface NetworkRepository
    Network interface repository.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkInfo> getNetworkInfo() 
      io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkConfiguration> getNetworkProperties() 
      io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkType> getNetworkType()
      Get current network type.
      io.reactivex.Observable<RentalFees> getRentalFees() 
      io.reactivex.Observable<TransactionFees> getTransactionFees()
      Returns information about the average, median, highest and lower fee multiplier over the last "numBlocksTransactionFeeStats".

    • Method Detail

      • getNetworkType

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkType> getNetworkType()
        Get current network type.
        Returns:
        network type enum.

      • getTransactionFees

        io.reactivex.Observable<TransactionFees> getTransactionFees()
        Returns information about the average, median, highest and lower fee multiplier over the last "numBlocksTransactionFeeStats".
        Returns:
        the TransactionFees

      • getNetworkInfo

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkInfo> getNetworkInfo()
        Returns:
        the network information with like the network's name and description.

      • getRentalFees

        io.reactivex.Observable<RentalFees> getRentalFees()
        Returns:
        the estimated effective rental fees for namespaces and mosaics. This endpoint is only available if the REST instance has access to catapult-server ``resources/config-network.properties`` file. To activate this feature, add the setting "network.propertiesFilePath" in the configuration file (rest/resources/rest.json).

      • getNetworkProperties

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkConfiguration> getNetworkProperties()
        Returns:
        the content from a catapult-server network configuration file (resources/config-network.properties). To enable this feature, the REST setting "network.propertiesFilePath" must define where the file is located. This is adjustable via the configuration file (rest/resources/rest.json) per REST instance.
